# NETWORK::NETWORK_GET_DESTROYER_OF_ENTITY

## Summary
Returns the player index of the player that destroyed the entity with the specified entity ID

## Parameters
* **ENTITY_INDEX** entityIndex
* **WEAPON_TYPE\*** typeOfWeapon

## Returns
* **PLAYER_INDEX**

## Description
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
This command can be used for any physical objects withinthe game (e.g. cars, peds and objects).
